name: GetDataObject
description: Retrieve a data object using collection name and UUID.

parameters.name: collection_name
parameters.description: Name of the collection (class) the object belongs to.

value_schema.description: Name of the collection (class) the object belongs to.

parameters.name: object_uuid
parameters.description: Unique UUID of the object to be retrieved from the specified collection.

value_schema.description: Unique UUID of the object to be retrieved.

parameters.name: include_additional_information
parameters.description: Specify additional info to include: `classification`, `vector`, or `interpretation`.

value_schema.description: Include additional information, such as classification information. Allowed values include: `classification`, `vector` and `interpretation`.

parameters.name: required_replica_acknowledgment
parameters.description: Specifies how many replicas must confirm a request for success. Relates to consistency level.

value_schema.description: Determines how many replicas must acknowledge a request before it is considered successful.

parameters.name: target_node_name
parameters.description: Specify the target node to fulfill the request.

value_schema.description: The target node which should fulfill the request.

parameters.name: tenant_identifier
parameters.description: Specify the tenant for a multi-tenant collection request.

value_schema.description: Specifies the tenant in a request targeting a multi-tenant collection (class).

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the weaviate API.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Include additional information, such as classification information. Allowed values include: `classification`, `vector` and `interpretation`.

value_schema.description: Include additional information, such as classification information. Allowed values include: `classification`, `vector` and `interpretation`.

parameters.name: consistency_level
parameters.description: Determines how many replicas must acknowledge a request before it is considered successful.

value_schema.description: Determines how many replicas must acknowledge a request before it is considered successful.

parameters.name: node_name
parameters.description: The target node which should fulfill the request.

value_schema.description: The target node which should fulfill the request.

parameters.name: tenant
parameters.description: Specifies the tenant in a request targeting a multi-tenant collection (class).

value_schema.description: Specifies the tenant in a request targeting a multi-tenant collection (class).

parameters.name: className
parameters.description: Name of the collection (class) the object belongs to.

value_schema.description: Name of the collection (class) the object belongs to.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique UUID of the object to be retrieved.

value_schema.description: Unique UUID of the object to be retrieved.
